headline: Gold prices fall as easing trade concerns dampen appeal
text: Gold prices fell on Friday, as investor concerns over Donald Trump's tariffs continued to ease.

headline: Oil prices tumble 3% on potential for US-Iran deal and higher inventories
text: Oil prices slid more than 3% on Thursday morning, amid expectations of a potential nuclear deal between the US and Iran.

headline: Gold Declines as Growing Trade Optimism Hurts Haven Demand
text: (Bloomberg) -- Gold slipped to the lowest in more than a month as tension eased in the global trade war, pushing investors away from haven demand. headline: Gold & the Fed: Investing in the metal amid rate cut hopes
text: Gold (GC=F) prices tick higher on Tuesday as softer-than-expected US inflation data fuels new hopes for the Federal Reserve to cut interest rates. Bob Iaccino, Path Trading Partners chief market strategist and Co-Host of The Futures Edge Podcast, breaks down why he still sees upside for gold and how peoples should be investing into the commodity. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Market Domination here.

headline: Oil dips after rally fuelled by US-China tariff truce
text: Gold prices were lower too, as the de-escalation in US-China trade tensions weakened safe-haven demand

headline: Gold prices rise as investors 'value-buying' after US-China tariff truce
text: Gold prices recovered some ground on Tuesday morning, after having fallen following news of a tariff truce between the US and China.

headline: Oil prices soar, gold slips on US-China trade updates
text: Crude oil prices (CL=F, BZ=F) are seeing a boost after the US and China agree to pause their reciprocal tariffs for 90 days, while gold (GC=F) edges lower Monday morning. DoubleLine portfolio manager and strategic commodity strategy Jeff Mayberry talks about the price outlook on these commodities. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Catalysts here.

headline: Oil prices rise, gold slips, Kindly MD-Nakamoto merger
text: Yahoo Finance host Josh Lipton tracks today's top moving stocks and biggest market stories in this Market Minute, including rising oil prices (CL=F, BZ=F) after US and Chinese officials agree to terms, gold prices (GC=F) slip, and Kindly MD (KDLY) shares skyrocket on headlines of its merger with Nakamoto to establish a bitcoin (BTC-USD) treasury. Stay up to date on the latest market action, minute-by-minute, with Yahoo Finance's Market Minute.

headline: US-China trade truce, April CPI, drug prices: 3 Things
text: US stock futures (ES=F, NQ=F, YM=F) are surging Monday morning after US and China officials agreed to significant cuts to each country's respective tariff rates in a 90-day cool-off period. April's Consumer Price Index (CPI) is due out tomorrow, reporting month-over-month trends in US inflation rates. President Trump vows to cut prescription drug prices by as much as 80%. In turn, pharmaceutical stocks are seeing across the board pullbacks in pre-market trading. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Morning Brief here.

headline: Gold takes a dive as US-China trade deal dents safe-haven appeal
text: Meanwhile, oil jumped by almost 3% as Washington and Beijing agreed to slash tariffs on each other.

headline: Oil prices rise ahead of US-China trade talks
text: Oil prices rose in early European trading on Friday, ahead of trade talks between the US and China this weekend.

headline: Pound rises after Bank of England interest rate cut
text: The pound rose against the dollar on Thursday afternoon, after the Bank of England cut interest rates.

headline: Gold Holds Drop as Powell Says Fed in No Hurry to Adjust Rates

headline: Oil prices rise amid US-China trade talk optimism
text: Oil prices rose on Wednesday morning, amid investor optimism around trade talks between the US and China, which are due to begin this week.

headline: Market's 200-day moves, dollar trends, gold: Market Takeaways
text: All three of the US market indexes (^DJI, ^IXIC, ^GSPC) ended the day in negative territory, marking their second session of losses in a row after snapping their respective win streaks. This all comes ahead of the Federal Reserve's next interest rate decision to come tomorrow, Wednesday, May 7. Yahoo Finance markets and data editor Jared Blikre explains several key market themes, including the market's 200-day moving averages, falling values for the US dollar in foreign currency exchanges, and gold price volatility. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Asking for a Trend here.

headline: Gold prices rise: Portfolio mgr. outlines 3 gold mining stocks
text: Gold (GC=F) prices are rising as a weaker US dollar (DX=F, DX-Y.NYB) and looming trade tariff talks push investors toward safe-haven assets. Chris Mancini, associate portfolio manager of the Gabelli Gold Fund at Gabelli Funds, joins Wealth to explain why gold is gaining more appeal. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Wealth here.

headline: Gold extends losses as tariff tensions ease
text: Oil prices head lower after posting biggest monthly fall since 2021.

headline: Gold soars, tech stumbles: The market story of Trump's first 100 days in 1 chart
text: After cheering his election win last year, markets have had a cooler reaction to President Trump's first 100 days in office. Unless you're a gold bug.

headline: Trump's first 100 days: Where the markets stand
text: President Donald Trump has been celebrating 100 days in office. So how have the markets performed? The S&P 500 (^GSPC) posted a 7% decline over the first 100 days. Bitcoin (BTC-USD) and oil (CL=F) have slipped, too. But one asset that has risen? Gold (GOLD) as investors sought safety during the recent market volatility. Piper Sandler chief investment strategist Michael Kantrowitz says that the issue is that markets are still adjusting to the high tariffs imposed by the president.  Market Domination Overtime Anchor Julie Hyman takes a closer look at the market returns under the first 100 days of Trump 2.0. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Market Domination Overtime here.

headline: The pros and cons of investing in gold
text: Gold prices (GC=F) are pulling back slightly after hitting a record high last week, as more investors look to it as a hedge during market volatility. Yahoo Finance personal finance editor Molly Moorhead breaks down how to best invest in gold, including investments into gold ETFs. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Wealth here.

headline: Oil prices on course for biggest monthly fall since 2021
text: The drop comes as the global trade war has put doubt in the minds of traders about demand.

headline: Here is one thing that could derail the gold rally
text: Gold (GC=F) prices have soared nearly 30% so far this year, hitting new all-time highs. In the video above, HSBC chief precious metals analyst James Steel explains what has driven gold prices higher and what could put that rally on hold. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Market Domination here.

headline: Oil prices fall as fears trade war will dent demand linger
text: Oil prices fell as investors remained concerned about the impact of a US-China trade war on demand for fuel.

headline: 4 market signals to watch, strategist says
text: Markets (^GSPC, ^IXIC, ^DJI) may be setting up for a familiar pattern as key indicators like the gold-to-silver ratio (GC=F, SI=F), long bonds, SPDR S&P 500 (SPY), and US dollar (DX=F) mirror moves seen during the 2022 downturn. Michele Schneider, MarketGauge.com chief strategist, joins Morning Brief to break down what these signals could mean for investors. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Morning Brief here.

headline: Gold price dips as US-China trade tensions ease
text: Oil rose but global demand outlook remains blurry amid Trump's trade war.

headline: Oil heads for weekly fall under US-China tariff woes
text: Gold and pound retreat as investors try to figure out Donald Trump's policies.
